ConditionalTestUnit.Description: Initialization: fit curves, minRFU, pull-ups, artifacts, ILS, assign signals to loci and extended loci, file type; Samples: match ladder

SmartMessage.Name: smILSSpacingFailed
SmartMessage.Text: ILS SPACING DOES NOT MEET EXPECTED PARAMETERS

SmartMessage.Name: smLadderTypeUnknown
SmartMessage.Text: THE ALLELIC LADDER TYPE IS NOT RECOGNIZED

SmartMessage.Name: smReagentKitUnknown
SmartMessage.Text: THE REAGENT KIT IS NOT RECOGNIZED

SmartMessage.Name: smMoreThanOneReagentKit
SmartMessage.Text: MORE THAN ONE REAGENT KIT IS IDENTIFIED IN THE DIRECTORY

AlternateReportCriterion.Expression: smPullUpAtAllele OR smPullUpAtControlPeak OR smInterlocusPullUpWithPoorFit OR smSignalIsCtrlPeak OR smSignalIsAllele

SmartMessage.Name: smPossibleExtraLocusAllele
SmartMessage.Text: Peak is a Possible Unreported OL Allele

SmartMessage.Name: smMarkerSetNameUnknown
SmartMessage.Text: COULD NOT FIND POPULATION MARKER SET NAMED:

SmartMessage.Name: smNamedILSUnknown
SmartMessage.Text: COULD NOT FIND INTERNAL LANE STANDARD NAMED:

SmartMessage.Name: smNoPosCtrlFound
SmartMessage.Text: NO POSITIVE CONTROL FOUND IN DIRECTORY

SmartMessage.Name: smNoNegCtrlFound
SmartMessage.Text: NO NEGATIVE CONTROL FOUND IN DIRECTORY

SmartMessage.Name: smPeakHeightAboveMax
SmartMessage.Description: Set during lane standard analysis in stage 1

SmartMessage.Name: smPeaksAboveMax
SmartMessage.Text: ONE OR MORE PEAKS ABOVE MAXIMUM THRESHOLD

SmartMessage.Name: smILSNeighborFilterTooAggressive
SmartMessage.Text: ILS NEIGHBOR FILTERS REMOVE TOO MANY PEAKS

SmartMessage.Name: smILSFractionFilterTooAggressive
SmartMessage.Text: ILS FRACTIONAL HEIGHT FILTER REMOVES TOO MANY PEAKS

SmartMessage.Name: smILSRelativeHeightsInconsistent
SmartMessage.Text: ILS RELATIVE HEIGHTS INCONSISTENT WITH EXPECTED HEIGHTS

SmartMessage.Name: smOsirisBelowMinRFUButRawDataAbove
SmartMessage.Text: Conflict OSIRIS Below Min RFU; Raw Data Above

SmartMessage.Name: smRawDataBelowMinRFUButOsirisAbove
SmartMessage.Text: Conflict: Raw Data Below Min RFU; OSIRIS Above

SmartMessage.Name: smOsirisAboveMaxRFUButRawDataBelow
SmartMessage.Text: Conflict: Osiris Above Max RFU; Raw Data Below

SmartMessage.Name: smRawDataAboveMaxRFUButOsirisBelow
SmartMessage.Text: Conflict: Raw Data Above Max RFU; OSsiris Below

SmartMessage.Name: smTotalNumberOfSamplesWithExcessivePullup

CountingDataInfo.ThresholdDescriptor: Total Number of Samples With Excesive Pullup

SmartMessage.Text: TOTAL NUMBER OF SAMPLES WITH EXCESSIVE PULLUP

SmartMessage.Name: smPercentOfSamplesWithExcessivePullup

PercentDataInfo.ThresholdDescriptor: Percent of Samples With Excesive Pullup

SmartMessage.Text: PERCENT OF SAMPLES WITH EXCESSIVE PULLUP

ConditionalTestUnit.Description: Samples: Preliminary locus and interlocus analysis, fractional filter, stutter, etc., peak morphology; Ladders: Locus peaks

SmartMessage.Name: smAdenylation
SmartMessage.Description: May be evaluated at any time from stage 1 to stage 4

SmartMessage.Name: smSignalIsCtrlPeak
SmartMessage.Description: Set in lane standard analysis (stage 1) and ladder locus analysis (stage 2)
SmartMessage.Text: SIGNAL IS A CONTROL PEAK (ILS OR LOCUS)

SmartMessage.Name: smInterlocusPeak
SmartMessage.Description: Peak between ladder loci, but probably should not be reported as is

SmartMessage.Name: smPoorPeakMorphology
SmartMessage.Description: This does not refer to fit, but rather to width

SmartMessage.Name: smPoorLocusMorphology
SmartMessage.Description: This refers to spacing primarily

SmartMessage.Name: smLocusMayHaveUnreportedOLs
SmartMessage.Text: LOCUS MAY HAVE UNREPORTED OFF-LADDER ALLELES

SmartMessage.Name: smNPeaksForLocusUnavailable
SmartMessage.Text: SETUP ERROR: NUMBER OF PEAKS UNAVAILABLE FOR LOCUS

SmartMessage.Name: smRelativeHeightImbalance
SmartMessage.Description: For control peaks, where relative heights may be known

SmartMessage.Name: smHeightBelowFractionalFilter
SmartMessage.Description: For test within a locus or an ILS
SmartMessage.Text: Signal Height Below Minimum Fractional Filter Height

SmartMessage.Name: smHeightBelowPullupFractionalFilter
SmartMessage.Description: For test within locus or an ILS
SmartMessage.Text: Signal Height Below Minimum Pullup Fractional Filter Height

SmartMessage.Name: smBelowFractionalFilterLeft
SmartMessage.Description: For interlocus peak

SmartMessage.Name: smBelowFractionalFilterRight
SmartMessage.Description: For interlocus peak

SmartMessage.Name: smWouldCauseHeterozygousImbalanceLeft
SmartMessage.Text: Signal Would Cause Heterozygous Imbalance in Locus to Left

SmartMessage.Name: smWouldCauseHeterozygousImbalanceRight
SmartMessage.Text: Signal Would Cause Heterozygous Imbalance in Locus to Right

SmartMessage.Name: smSignalOffGridLeft
SmartMessage.Text: Signal Would Be Off-Grid for Locus to Left

SmartMessage.Name: smSignalOffGridRight
SmartMessage.Text: Signal Would Be Off-Grid for Locus to Right

SmartMessage.Name: sm0UnambiguousPeaksLeft
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Left Has 0 Unambiguous Peaks

SmartMessage.Name: sm0UnambiguousPeaksRight
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Right Has 0 Unambiguous Peaks

SmartMessage.Name: sm1UnambiguousPeakLeft
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Left Has 1 Unambiguous Peak

SmartMessage.Name: sm1UnambiguousPeakRight
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Right Has 1 Unambiguous Peak

SmartMessage.Name: sm2PlusUnambiguousPeaksLeft
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Left Has 2 Plus Unambiguous Peaks

SmartMessage.Name: sm2PlusUnambiguousPeaksRight
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Right Has 2 Plus Unambiguous Peaks

SmartMessage.Name: sm0AmbiguousPeaksLeft
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Left Has 0 Ambiguous Peaks

SmartMessage.Name: sm0AmbiguousPeaksRight
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Right Has 0 Ambiguous Peaks

SmartMessage.Name: sm1AmbiguousPeakLeft
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Left Has 1 Ambiguous Peak

SmartMessage.Name: sm1AmbiguousPeakRight
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Right Has 1 Ambiguous Peak

SmartMessage.Name: sm2PlusAmbiguousPeaksLeft
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Left Has 2 Plus Ambiguous Peaks

SmartMessage.Name: sm2PlusAmbiguousPeaksRight
SmartMessage.Text: Locus to Left Has 2 Plus Ambiguous Peaks

TestCriterion.Expression: sm1UnambiguousPeakLeft AND NOT smSignalOffGridLeft AND smTemp1Left
sm0UnambiguousPeaksLeft AND sm2PlusAmbiguousPeaksRight AND NOT smSignalOffGridLeft AND smTemp1Left
sm2PlusUnambiguousPeaksLeft AND sm2PlusUnambiguousPeaksRight AND smSignalOffGridRight AND NOT smPurePullup AND NOT smSignalOffGridLeft
sm1UnambiguousPeakRight AND NOT smSignalOffGridRight AND smTemp1Right
sm0UnambiguousPeaksRight AND sm2PlusAmbiguousPeaksLeft AND NOT smSignalOffGridRight AND smTemp1Right
sm2PlusUnambiguousPeaksRight AND sm2PlusUnambiguousPeaksLeft AND smSignalOffGridLeft AND NOT smPurePullup AND NOT smSignalOffGridRight

SmartMessage.Name: smPullUpAtControlPeak
SmartMessage.Text: PULL-UP COINCIDES WITH CONTROL (ILS OR LADDER) PEAK

SmartMessage.Name: smInterlocusPullUpWithPoorFit

TestCriterion.Expression: (smPartOfExtendedLocusRight OR smPartOfExtendedLocusLeft) AND (smCurveFitFailed OR smCurveFitMarginal) AND smPurePullup

SmartMessage.Text: Signal Is an Inter-Locus Pull-up with Substandard Fit

SmartMessage.Name: smPossibleValidInterlocusLeft
SmartMessage.Description: Peak in extended locus left and above fractional filter

SmartMessage.Name: smPossibleValidInterlocusRight
SmartMessage.Description: Peak in extended locus right and above fractional filter

SmartMessage.Name: smUnassignedInterlocusPeak
SmartMessage.Description: Peak lies between two non-intersecting extended regions

TestCriterion.Expression: smInterlocusPeak AND NOT (smPartOfExtendedLocusLeft OR smPartOfExtendedLocusRight OR smInterlocusPullUpWithPoorFit)

SmartMessage.Name: smAmbiguousInterlocus
SmartMessage.Description: Peak lies in two extended locus regions and is above fractional filter height for both

SmartMessage.Name: smPossibleAmbiguousInterlocusAssignedToLocus
SmartMessage.Text: Possible Ambiguous Interlocus Peak Assigned To Locus

SmartMessage.Name: smTooLowInterlocusPeak
SmartMessage.Description: Peak can be assigned to one or both loci, but is below fractional filter for each locus possible

ConditionalTestUnit.Description: Preliminary allele calls, craters, interlocus calls; Ladders: skip

SmartMessage.Name: smCouldBelongToLocusLeft
SmartMessage.Text: Signal Could Belong to Locus to Left

SmartMessage.Name: smCouldBelongToLocusRight
SmartMessage.Text: Signal Could Belong to Locus to Right

SmartMessage.Name: smHeightBelowInterlocusMinRFU
SmartMessage.Text: Peak Height Below Min Interlocus RFU

SmartMessage.Name: smFirstAlleleEqFirstLadderPeak
SmartMessage.Text: FIRST ALLELE IS FIRST LADDER PEAK

SmartMessage.Name: smCraterSidePeak
SmartMessage.Text: Initial Diagnosis: Possible Crater Side Peak

SmartMessage.Name: smAcceptedOLLeft
SmartMessage.Description: On user list of accepted OL alleles (left of ladder peaks)

SmartMessage.Name: smAcceptedOLRight
SmartMessage.Description: On user list of accepted OL alleles (right of ladder peaks)

SmartMessage.Name: smValidOLInterlocusLeft
SmartMessage.Description: Valid interlocus allele but not on user list

SmartMessage.Name: smValidOLInterlocusRight
SmartMessage.Description: Valid interlocus allele but not on user list

SmartMessage.Name: smAcceptedInterlocusLeft
SmartMessage.Description: Valid interlocus allele that is on user list

SmartMessage.Name: smAcceptedInterlocusRight
SmartMessage.Description: Valid interlocus allele that is on user list

SmartMessage.Name: smNoXForAMEL
SmartMessage.Text: X ALLELE FOR AMELOGENIN COULD NOT BE FOUND

ConditionalTestUnit.Description: Quality testing: positive ctrl, AMEL, cross channel corrections, final Locus assessment

SmartMessage.Name: smSignalNotACrater
SmartMessage.Text: Initially Considered As A Possible Crater

SmartMessage.Name: smSignalNotACraterSidePeak
SmartMessage.Text: Initially Considered As A Possible Crater Side Peak

TestCriterion.Expression: smCrater AND NOT smSignalNotACrater AND NOT smRestrictedPriorityPeak
smCraterSidePeak AND NOT smSignalNotACraterSidePeak AND NOT smRestrictedPriorityPeak

SmartMessage.Name: smUnexpectedNoOfPeaksInChannel
SmartMessage.Text: UNEXPECTED NUMBER OF PEAKS IN CHANNEL

SmartMessage.Name: smTwoOrMoreAlleles
SmartMessage.Text: TWO OR MORE ALLELES WERE IDENTIFIED

SmartMessage.Name: smLocusContainsPullUpWithHeteroImbalance
SmartMessage.Text: LOCUS CONTAINS PULLUP WITH HETEROZYGOUS IMBALANCE

SmartMessage.Name: smHomozygoteHeightProblem
SmartMessage.Text: SINGLE PEAK DETECTED; HEIGHT INAPPROPRIATE FOR HOMOZYGOTE

SmartMessage.Name: smPosCtrlLocusNotFound
SmartMessage.Text: POSITIVE CONTROL LOCUS NOT FOUND IN SET

SmartMessage.Name: smPreliminaryLocusHas2OrMoreAlleles
SmartMessage.Text: PRELIMINARY LOCUS ANALYSIS SHOWS 3 OR MORE ALLELES

SmartMessage.Name: smSignalIsPullupAndPoorMorphologyOrResidualInMultiAllele

TestCriterion.Expression: smPurePullup AND smPreliminaryLocusHas2OrMoreAlleles AND smBPResidualTooLarge AND NOT smRestrictedPriorityPeak

SmartMessage.Text: Pullup with Excess Residual in Multi-allele

SmartMessage.Name: smLocusContainsPeaksWithExcessiveResiduals
SmartMessage.Text: LOCUS CONTAINS PEAKS WITH EXCESSIVE RESIDUALS:

SmartMessage.Name: smExtraLadderAllele
SmartMessage.Description: Intralocus peak is stutter or adenylation to interlocus peak that may or may not represent an allele???

SmartMessage.Name: smCriticalMessagesAtILS
SmartMessage.Text: CRITICAL LEVEL MESSAGES AT ILS PEAK(S):

SmartMessage.Name: smAMELHasExtraneousPeaks
SmartMessage.Text: AMEL CONTAINS ONE OR MORE EXTRANEOUS PEAKS AT LOCATION(S)

SmartMessage.Name: smNegCtrlChannelHasNoPrimerPeaks
SmartMessage.Text: NEGATIVE CONTROL CHANNEL CONTAINS NO PRIMER PEAKS

SmartMessage.Name: smNegCtrlChannelsHaveNoPrimerPeaks
SmartMessage.Text: ONE OR MORE NEGATIVE CONTROL CHANNELS CONTAIN NO PRIMER PEAKS

SmartMessage.Name: smInterlocusPeaksToRight
SmartMessage.Text: ONE OR MORE INTERLOCUS PEAKS TO RIGHT OF LOCUS AT:

SmartMessage.Name: smInterlocusPeaksToLeft
SmartMessage.Text: ONE OR MORE INTERLOCUS PEAKS TO LEFT OF LOCUS AT:

TestCriterion.Expression: smSignalOL AND smSignalIsAllele AND NOT smPeakIsNotAnAllele AND NOT smRestrictedPriorityPeak
smSignalIsAllele AND NOT smPeakIsNotAnAllele AND NOT smRestrictedPriorityPeak

SmartMessage.Name: smThreeOrMoreAlleles
SmartMessage.Text: THREE OR MORE ALLELES WERE IDENTIFIED

SmartMessage.Name: smTotalNumberOfHomozygousLoci
SmartMessage.Description: Total Number of Homozygous Loci

SmartMessage.Name: smTotalNumberOfTriallelicLoci
SmartMessage.Description: Total Number of Triallelic Loci

SmartMessage.Name: smTotalNumberOfMissingGenotypes
SmartMessage.Text: TOTAL NUMBER OF LOCI MISSING GENOTYPES

SmartMessage.Name: smTotalNumberOfSignals
SmartMessage.Description: Total Number of Peaks
SmartMessage.Text: TOTAL NUMBER OF PEAKS FOR SAMPLE

SmartMessage.Name: smTotalNumberOfAllelePeaks
SmartMessage.Description: Total Number of Allele Peaks
SmartMessage.Text: TOTAL NUMBER OF ALLELE PEAKS FOR SAMPLE

SmartMessage.Name: smTotalNumberOfLoci
SmartMessage.Description: Total Number of Loci

SmartMessage.Name: smNumberOfPullUpsInSample

CountingDataInfo.ThresholdDescriptor: Maximum Number of Pull-ups in Sample Threshold

SmartMessage.Text: NUMBER OF PULLUPS IN SAMPLE EXCEEDS THRESHOLD

SmartMessage.Name: smIsSampleWithExcessivePullup
SmartMessage.Text: Is a Sample With Excessive Pullup

SmartMessage.Name: smNumberOfExcessiveResidualsInSample
SmartMessage.Text: NUMBER OF EXCESSIVE RESIDUALS IN SAMPLE EXCEEDS THRESHOLD

SmartMessage.Name: smPercentExcessiveResiduals

PercentDataInfo.ThresholdDescriptor: Maximum Percentage of Alleles With Excessive Residuals

SmartMessage.Text: PERCENT OF ALLELES WITH EXCESSIVE RESIDUALS EXCEEDS THRESHOLD

PercentDataInfo.ThresholdDescriptor: Maximum Percentage of Peaks with Pullup

SmartMessage.Name: smNumberOfStuttersInSample

CountingDataInfo.ThresholdDescriptor: Maximum Number of Stutters in Sample

SmartMessage.Text: NUMBER OF STUTTER PEAKS EXCEEDS THRESHOLD

SmartMessage.Name: smNumberOfAdenylationsInSample

CountingDataInfo.ThresholdDescriptor: Maximum Number of Adenylations in Sample

SmartMessage.Text: NUMBER OF ADENYLATION PEAKS EXCEEDS THRESHOLD

SmartMessage.Name: smNumberOfOffLadderAllelesInSample

CountingDataInfo.ThresholdDescriptor: Maximum Number of Off-Ladder Alleles in Sample

SmartMessage.Text: NUMBER OF OFF-LADDER ALLELES EXCEEDS THRESHOLD

SmartMessage.Name: smChannelPeaksHaveCriticalArtifacts
SmartMessage.Text: CHANNEL PEAKS HAVE CRITICAL ARTIFACTS AT LOCATION(S):

SmartMessage.Name: smUnexpectedPeakInNegativeControl
SmartMessage.Text: UNEXPECTED PEAK FOUND IN NEGATIVE CONTROL

SmartMessage.Name: smLadderFailed
SmartMessage.Text: ALLELIC LADDER COULD NOT BE ANALYZED

SmartMessage.Name: smNumberOfCratersInSample

CountingDataInfo.ThresholdDescriptor: Maximum Number of Craters in Sample

SmartMessage.Text: NUMBER OF CRATER PEAKS EXCEEDS THRESHOLD

CountingDataInfo.ThresholdDescriptor: Maximum Number of Spikes in a Sample
